mapper.select: select e.emp_id as emp_id, e.emp_nm as emp_nm, e.dept_id as dept_id, d.dept_nm as dept_nm, p.pos_nm as pos_nm from emp e inner join dept d on e.dept_id = d.dept_id inner join pos p on e.pos_id = p.pos_id and e.emp_id = #{emp_id}
select att_dt, att_time, lev_time from attendance where emp_id = #{emp_id} and att_dt = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
